alert.note: Alert for Harnett; Johnston; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Harnett, southern Wake and Johnston Counties through 415 AM EDT... At 314 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Angier, or 15 miles west of Smithfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. Additional strong storms were located near Seminole and Clayton. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Smithfield, Lillington, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Clayton, Zebulon, Angier, Benson and Holly Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
